## Example 1

```{r}
library(ideogRam)
library(GenomicRanges)
```


```{r}
data <- GRanges(c("2", "17"),
                IRanges(c(34294, 43125400), c(125482, 43125482)), color = c("red", "green"))

p <- ideogRam(organism = "human") %>%
    set_option(orientation = "horizontal") %>%
    add_track(data)
# unclass(ideogRam:::compile_ideogram(p))$x$data %>% jsonlite::prettify()
p
```
